outputs.output_descr: The Millennium Villages aims to establish a rigorous proof of concept for implementing the practical interventions needed to achieve MDGs in Rural Africa over a five years time frame. Based on $50 per person per year the project aims at improving people's lives with special emphasis to  areas of Agriculture, Education, Health and Infrastructure.

Il s'agit d'un projet de développement dont l'objectif principal est l'atteinte des 8 objectifs du Millénaire pour le Développement dans Potou et 13 villages de recherche dans la Communauté Rurale de Léona.

The Millennium Villages aims to establish a rigorous proof of concept for implementing the practical interventions needed to achieve MDGs in Rural Africa over a five years time frame. Based on $50 per person per year the project aims at improving people's lives with special emphasis to  areas of Agriculture, Education, Health and Infrastructure.

The Millennium Village project is an integrated rural development project which will improve the lives of the people in the villages in the areas of Agriculture, Education, Health and Infrastructure. The project aims to attain the MDGs in 5 years with an additional investment of $50 per person per year. The coordination unit at HQ is to ensure swift implementation of the project trhough the country office, good relationship with the partners / donors and providing guidance and support for expansion (new MVs) and national MDG scale up programs.

The Millennium Villages aims to establish a rigorous proof of concept for implementing the practical interventions needed to achieve MDGs in Rural Africa over a five years time frame. Based on $50 per person per year the project aims at improving people's lives with special emphasis to areas of Agriculture, Education, Health and Infrastructure.Eliminate hunger and malnutrition,improved maternal health, increased assess to energy, digital gaps bridged in pursuit of the MDGs in selected villages.

Based on $50 per person per year the project aims at improving people's lives with special emphasis to  areas of Agriculture, Education, Health and Infrastructure.

Based on $110 per person per year the project aims at improving people's lives with special emphasis to areas of Agriculture, Education, Health and Infrastructure.

project_descr: Projet de recherche à base communautaire avec comme objectif l'atteinte des 8 OMD dans Potou et 13 villages de la Communauté Rurale de Léona
project_title: Projet des Villages du Millénaire (MV1) - Senegal
